Translations.Text: ye duno apne rab ke baare mein eqtelaaf karne waale hai, pas kaafiro ke liye to aag ke kapde byonath kar kaate jayenge aur un ke saro ke upar se saqth khaulta hoa paani bahaya jayega
jis se un ke pet ki sab cheeze aur khaale gala di jayengi
aur un ki saza ke liye loohe ke hatode hai
ye jab bhi wahaan ke gham se nikal bhaagne ka iraada karenge, waheen lauta diye jayenge aur (kaha jayega) jalne ka azaab chako

imaan waalo aur nek kaam waalo ko Allah ta’ala un jannato mein le jayega, jin ke daraqto ta le se nehre lehre le rahi hai, jahaan wo sone ke kangan pehnaaye jayenge aur sacche moti bhi, wahaan un ka libaas qaalis resham hoga
un ko paakiza baath ki rehnumaayi kar di gayi aur qaabile sadh tareef raah ki hidaayath kar di gayi

jin logo ne kufr kiya aur Allah ki raah se rokne lage aur us hurmath waali masjid se bhi, jise hum ne tamaam logo ke liye masaawi kar diya hai, waheen ke rehne waale ho, ya baaher ke ho, jo bhi zulm ke saath wahaan ilhaadh2 ka iraada kare, hum ose dard naak azaab chakayene

aur jab ke hum ne Ibraheem(alaihissalaam) ko kaabe ke makaan ki jageh muqarrar kar di, is shart par ke mere saath kisi ko shareek na karna aur mere ghar ko tawaaf, qiyaam, ruko, sajda karne waalo ke liye paak saaf rakhna
aur logo mein hajj ki munaadi karde, log tere paas pa-payaada bhi ayenge aur doble pathle oonto par bhi door daraaz ki tamaam raaho se ayenge
ta ke apne liye fayede haasil kare aur un muqarrara dino mein Allah ka naam yaad kare, un chau paayo par jo paalto hai, pas tum, aap bhi khaao aur bhuke faqiro ko bhi khilaao
phir wo apna mayl kuchayl door kare aur apni nazre puri kare aur Allah ke qadeem ghar ka tawaaf kare

ye hai, aur jo koyi Allah ki hurmato ki taazeem kare, us ke apne liye, us ke rab ke paas behetri hai aur tumhaare liye chau paaye jaanwar halaal kar diye gaye, bajuz un ke jo tumhaare saamne bayaan kiye gaye hai, pas tumhe butho ki gandagi se bachte rehna chahiye aur jhooti baath se bhi parhez karna chahiye

Allah ki tawheed ko maante hoye, us ke saath kisi ko shareek na karte hoye, suno Allah ke saath shareek karne wala, goya asmaan se gir pada, ab ya to ose parinde uchak le jayenge ya hawa kisi door daraaz ki jageh phek de gi
ye sun liya, ab aur suno! Allah ki nishaaniyo ki jo izzath wa hurmath kare, us ke dil ki parhezgaari ki wajeh se ye hai
un mein tumhaare liye ek muqarrar waqt tak ka fayeda hai, phir un ke halaal hone ki jageh, khaane kaaba hai

aur har ummath ke liye hum ne qurbaani ke tariqe muqarrar farmaaye hai, ta ke wo un chaupaaye jaanwaro par Allah ka naam le, jo Allah ne unhe de rakhe hai, samajh lo ke tum sab ka maboodh bar haq sirf ek hee hai, tum osi ke taabe farmaan ho jaao, aajizi karne waalo ko khush qabri suna di jiye

unhe, ke jab Allah ka zikr kiya jaaye, unke dil tharra jaate hai, unhe jo buraayi pahonche, us par sabr karte hai, namaaz qaayam karne waale hai aur jo kuch hum ne unhe se rakha hai, wo us mein se bhi dete rehte hai

qurbaani ke oonto ko, hum ne tumhaare liye Allah ta’ala ki nishaaniyo mein shaamil kar diya hai, un mein tumhe nafa hai, pas unhe khada kar ke un par Allah ka naam lo, phir jab un ke pehlo zameen se lag jaaye, ose (khud bhi) khaao aur miskeen, sawaal se rukne waalo aur sawaal karne waalo ko bhi khilaao, isi tarah hum ne chau paayo ko tumhaare ma tehet kar diya hai, ke tum shukr guzaari karo

Allah ta’ala ko qurbaaniyo ke gosht nahi pahonchte, na un ke qoon, balke ose to tumhaare dil ki parhezgaari pahonchti hai, isi tarah Allah ne un jaanwaro ko tumhaara muthi kar diya hai ke tum us ki rehnumaayi ke shukriye mein us ki badaaiyya bayaan karo aur nek logo ko khush qabri suna di jiye
